original_text: And the name of Saul's wife was Ahinoam, the daughter of Ahimaaz: and the name of the captain of his host was Abner, the son of Ner, Saul's uncle.
korean_text: 사울의 아내의 이름은 아히노암이니 아히마아스의 딸이요 그의 군사령관의 이름은 아브넬이니 사울의 숙부 넬의 아들이며

sentences.original_text: And the name of Saul's wife was Ahinoam
and the name of the captain of his host was Abner
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 군대 장관의 이름은 아브너였으며
